context: Do you know what work Peter Segal directed?
Peter Segal is a well-known director with an impressive list of accomplishments! A couple of his most famous films are The Longest Yard and 50 First Dates.
I love those movies, I wasn't aware he directed those! Adam Sandler was the executive producer in the Longest Yard right?
resp: I'm not sure, but if you like Adam Sandler, might I suggest his films Happy Gilmore and Jack And Jill? He also wrote the latter!
